name: Aurelia Pearl Drop Necklace
fullDescription: The Aurelia Pearl Drop Necklace is the epitome of timeless elegance. Crafted in 18k solid gold, the delicate chain suspends a highly lustrous, hand-selected freshwater drop pearl. Designed to sit perfectly along the collarbone, it is the ideal subtle statement for any evening occasion. The necklace features a secure lobster clasp and an adjustable length detail for styling versatility.
craftsmanship: Handcrafted pearl setting; hand-polished chain links.

name: Eternity Diamond Band
shortDescription: Classic diamond eternity band in platinum.
fullDescription: Symbolizing eternal love, the Eternity Diamond Band is meticulously micro-pave set with brilliant-cut conflict-free diamonds. Set in pure platinum, the continuous line of diamonds catches light from every angle, delivering exceptional sparkle. This ring serves beautifully as a wedding band or a luxurious stacking ring to celebrate special milestones.

name: Sapphire Halo Stud Earrings
shortDescription: Deep blue sapphire studs with diamond halo.
fullDescription: These breathtaking stud earrings feature deep, velvety blue Ceylon sapphires encased in a brilliant halo of fine white diamonds. Set in 18k white gold, the Sapphire Halo Stud Earrings offer a striking contrast and regal aesthetic. The secure push-back closures ensure comfortable all-day wear.

name: Luminous Emerald Cut Ring
shortDescription: Emerald cut diamond ring with tapered baguettes.
fullDescription: An architectural marvel, the Luminous Emerald Cut Ring showcases a stunning 2-carat emerald cut center diamond, flanked by tapered baguette side stones. The clean lines and step-cut faceting create a sophisticated hall-of-mirrors effect, making this an unforgettable engagement or statement ring. Set in fine platinum.
craftsmanship: Precision step-cut diamonds; seamless bezel setting.

name: Golden Twist Tennis Bracelet
shortDescription: Modern twist on the classic tennis bracelet.
fullDescription: The Golden Twist Tennis Bracelet reimagines a classic. Replacing traditional straight lines with an intricate twisted 18k yellow gold framework, this bracelet securely cradles 3 carats of brilliant-cut diamonds. The flexible design drapes elegantly on the wrist, fastened by a hidden continuous safety clasp.
craftsmanship: Articulated links; hidden box catch closure.

name: Rose Gold Morganite Pendant
shortDescription: Soft pink morganite set in 14k rose gold.
fullDescription: Embrace romance with the Rose Gold Morganite Pendant. A cushion-cut peachy-pink morganite gemstone is suspended from a delicate 14k rose gold rolo chain. The minimalist claw setting allows maximum light to enter the stone, highlighting its soft, feminine hue. Perfect for adding a touch of warmth to any ensemble.

name: Art Deco Onyx Drop Earrings
shortDescription: Vintage-inspired black onyx and diamond drops.
fullDescription: Drawing inspiration from the 1920s, the Art Deco Onyx Drop Earrings feature geometric cuts of jet-black onyx bordered by brilliant sparkling diamonds. The distinctive chevron motifs are set in 18k white gold, providing dramatic movement and old-world glamour. Suitable for evening wear and black-tie events.

name: Classic Gold Bangle
fullDescription: The quintessential piece for any luxury jewelry collection. The Classic Gold Bangle is crafted from solid 18k yellow gold, featuring a sleek, unadorned surface buffed to a mirror finish. Its oval shape ensures an ergonomic fit, while the discreet hinge and push-button clasp provide effortless wearability.
craftsmanship: Hollow core seamless construction; mirror polish.
